item.title: D.R. Horton 在房价高企的季度订单量未达预期
item.description: 房屋建筑商D.R. Horton Inc.公布的季度订单量低于预期，原因是持续走高的抵押贷款利率给该公司专注的入门级市场带来了压力。【原文：Homebuilder D.R. Horton Inc. reported weaker-than-expected quarterly orders as persistently high mortgage rates pressured the entry-level market the company focuses on.】

item.title: 随着更多风电场停运，德国的风力发电目标受到威胁
item.description: 补贴计划结束后，德国拔掉的陆上风力发电场的插头数量首次超过了增加的数量，但在实现雄心勃勃的气候目标的竞赛中，德国仍然扩大了其最重要能源的产能。【原文：Germany unplugged more onshore wind farms than it added for the first time ever after subsidy programs ended, yet the nation still expanded capacity of its most important energy source in the race to meet ambitious climate targets.】

item.title: 房地产退出放缓，Blackstone 利润不及预期
item.description: 由于高利率压低了房地产估值，投资者对房地产业务的投入减少，Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s real estate arm weighed on the investment giant’s second-quarter results, as high interest rates crimped property valuations and investors pumped less money into the business.】

item.title: 古根海姆高管建造数百万套新房的大计划
item.description:
房利美和房地美有可能发挥强大的新作用。【原文：

A potentially powerful new role for Fannie and Freddie.

】

item.title: 吉姆-米尔斯坦（Jim Millstein）谈可增加数百万套住房的想法
item.description:
房利美和房地美能否启动多户住宅建设？【原文：

Can Fannie and Freddie jump start multi-family construction?

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。科技股将迎来反弹，欧洲央行将确定利率。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Tech shares are set for a rebound and the European Central Bank sets rates. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 需求不温不火，美国天气良好，大豆跌幅扩大
item.description: 在芝加哥，大豆跌幅扩大，创下近四年来的新低，原因是对美国大豆的需求不温不火，且当地农作物天气良好。【原文：Soybeans extended a drop to an almost four-year low in Chicago amid tepid demand for US beans and good weather for crops there.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯和 Stellantis 正在商谈支持塞尔维亚的锂业雄心
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）和 Stellantis NV 公司正在与塞尔维亚政府商讨投资锂加工和电动汽车电池生产，这可能会为可能成为欧洲最大锂矿的项目提供新的支持。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG and Stellantis NV are in discussions with Serbia’s government to invest in lithium-processing and EV battery production, potentially adding fresh support for what may become Europe’s biggest lithium mine.】

item.title: 丹格特称尼日利亚大型炼油厂已被当地原油价格所取代
item.description: 尼日利亚新的巨型炼油厂运营商称，当地原油价格正在上涨，迫使该厂依赖国外供应。【原文：Nigeria’s giant new refinery is being priced out of local crude, forcing the plant to rely on supplies from abroad, according to its operator.】

item.title: 可再生能源激增，德国电力交易接近三个月低点
item.description: 由于可再生能源充斥市场，而工业需求恢复缓慢，德国年前电力交易接近三个月来的最低点。【原文：German year-ahead power traded near the lowest in three months as renewable energy is flooding the market and industrial demand is slow to recover.】

item.title: 捷克创纪录的汽车产量带来经济复苏的希望
item.description: 捷克汽车产量在今年上半年创下历史新高，因为这个对中欧国家经济至关重要的行业正在从大流行病后的零部件短缺中恢复过来。【原文：Czech car production rose to an all-time high in the first half of the year as the industry that is key for the central European country’s economy is recovering from post-pandemic shortages of components.】

item.title: 孟加拉国在通胀开始缓解后维持政策利率不变
item.description: 孟加拉国中央银行维持关键政策利率不变，以支持经济增长，并严格控制上个月刚刚开始缓解的通货膨胀。【原文：Bangladesh’s central bank kept the key policy rate unchanged to support economic growth and keep a tight rein on inflation that has just started easing last month.】

item.title: 赞比亚养老基金将重点从购物中心转向基础设施建设
item.description: 赞比亚的主要养老基金正在将投资重点从苦苦挣扎的商场转向基础设施，寻求从新建道路和发电厂项目中获得更好的回报。【原文：Zambia’s main pension fund is switching its investment focus from struggling malls to infrastructure, seeking better returns from projects for new roads and power plants.】

item.title: 沙特国家航空公司将从德国购买 Lilium 电动喷气机
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯国家航空公司将从德国制造商 Lilium NV 购买 50 架电动飞机，并可选择加倍购买，因为这个石油资源丰富的王国正在寻求先进的旅游景点旅行方式。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s national carrier will buy 50 electric aircraft from German manufacturer Lilium NV, with an option to double the purchase as the oil-rich kingdom looks for advanced modes of travel to tourist attractions.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划对银行外汇利润一次性征收 50%的暴利税
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）计划对银行在去年奈拉贬值后获得的巨额货币收益一次性征收 50%的暴利税。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu plans to slap a one-off 50% tax on windfall profits booked by banks on massive currency gains after the naira was devalued last year.】

item.title: 中国将前外交部长秦刚赶出中央委员会
item.description: 中国称，前外交部长秦刚已被免去中央委员会委员职务。【原文：China said former Foreign Minister Qin Gang has been removed from the Central Committee.】

item.title: 中国调查欧盟猪肉进口，矛头直指欧盟最大卖家
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国已将来自欧盟的三家公司置于对该集团猪肉产品反倾销调查的中心。【原文：China has put three companies from the European Union at the center of its anti-dumping investigation into pork products from the bloc, the Commerce Ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿曼财富基金支持的港口运营商将亚洲交易提上日程
item.description: 由阿曼主权财富基金支持的阿西亚德集团（Asyad Group）正在寻求购买或运营东南亚、印度和非洲的港口，以扩大其在世界航运市场的份额。【原文：Asyad Group, backed by Oman’s sovereign wealth fund, is looking to buy or operate ports in southeast Asia, India and Africa as it seeks a bigger share of the world shipping market.】

item.title: 报告认为欧盟凝聚基金需要根本性改革
item.description: 根据 ZEW 的一份报告，欧盟耗资 3920 亿欧元用于消除由 27 个成员国组成的集团中较贫穷和较富裕地区之间差异的工具需要进行彻底改革。【原文：The European Union’s €392 billion tool to smooth out differences between the poorer and wealthier regions of the 27-member bloc need an overhaul, according to a ZEW report.】

item.title: 美国初创企业丰盛公司与阿尔法-达比计划投资 6.8 亿美元建设垂直农场
item.description: 美国农业初创公司 Plenty Unlimited Inc 和阿拉伯联合酋长国阿尔法-达比控股公司（Alpha Dhabi Holding PJSC）旗下的一家公司计划在未来五年内投资 6.8 亿美元，在这个大部分粮食需求靠进口的地区发展农场。【原文：US farming startup Plenty Unlimited Inc and a unit of United Arab Emirates’s Alpha Dhabi Holding PJSC are targeting $680 million of investments over the next five years to develop farms in a region which imports a majority of its food requirements.】

item.title: 意大利和法国借款人重返德国债务市场
item.description: 德国债务市场正在向德国以外的公司重新开放，2024 年法国和意大利借款人的融资额超过了去年全年。【原文：A German debt market is opening back up for companies beyond Germany, with more French and Italian borrowers raising financing in 2024 than over the whole of last year.】

item.title: 普拉博沃在财政部的侄子保证财政连续性
item.description: 印尼新任财政部副部长托马斯-迪万多诺（Thomas Djiwandono）是当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的侄子，他承诺将顺利完成财政交接，同时保证不会提高债务率或预算赤字。【原文：Indonesia’s new Deputy Finance Minister Thomas Djiwandono, nephew of President-elect Prabowo Subianto, is promising a smooth fiscal handover while pledging that he won’t raise the debt ratio or the budget deficit.】

item.title: 英国新劳动力调查因新数据问题推迟至 2025 年进行
item.description: 在国家统计局发现新的 "转型 "调查存在问题后，英格兰银行的政策制定者在明年之前将不得不使用低于标准的就业市场数据。【原文：Bank of England policymakers will have to operate with sub-standard jobs market data until next year after the Office for National Statistics uncovered problems with the new “transformed” survey that will replace the flawed existing release.】

item.title: ION 将于本周完成以 15 亿美元收购意大利 Prelios 公司的交易
item.description: ION 集团与意大利当局就收购资产管理公司 Prelios SpA 的交易进行了数月的反复磋商后，最快将于本周完成收购。【原文：ION Group is set to complete the acquisition of asset manager Prelios SpA as soon as this week, following months of back-and-forth with Italian authorities on the deal.】

item.title: 乌克兰开始与债券持有人进行第二轮限制性会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一批乌克兰债券持有人已签署了非披露协议，将与政府就 200 多亿美元的债务重组问题展开第二轮正式会谈。【原文：A group of Ukraine’s bondholders has signed non-disclosure agreements to begin a second round of official talks with the government about restructuring more than $20 billion of debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国实际工资终于回到金融危机前的峰值
item.description: 英国的实际工资终于回到了近二十年前金融危机爆发前的峰值，这对承诺提高生活水平的基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）新工党政府来说是一个鼓舞。【原文：UK real wages finally returned to their peak just before the financial crisis almost two decades ago, a boost to Keir Starmer’s new Labour government that has pledged to improve living standards.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"代表认为会议不会改变石油加价计划
item.description: 欧佩克+代表们预计，该组织下个月的监测会议将是例行会议，不会改变从第四季度开始增加供应的计划。【原文：OPEC+ delegates expect the group’s monitoring session next month to be routine, making no changes to plans for a supply hike starting in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦啤酒制造商以当地货币缴纳 5,500 万美元税款的申请失败
item.description: 津巴布韦啤酒生产商和可口可乐公司装瓶商 Delta Corp. 不服以当地货币支付 5500 万美元税款的上诉败诉，津巴布韦最高法院命令该公司以美元支付税款。【原文：Delta Corp., a Zimbabwean beer maker and Coca-Cola Co. bottler, lost an appeal against paying $55 million of taxes in local currency, with the nation’s top court ordering the company to pay in US dollars.】

item.title: 印度瞄准每年 1100 亿美元外国直接投资助推经济发展
item.description: 印度政府投资促进机构的一位高级官员表示，印度的目标是将每年的外国直接投资额提高 50%以上，以帮助促进经济增长。【原文：India is aiming to boost annual foreign direct investment by more than 50% to help lift economic growth, according to a top official at the government’s investment promotion agency.】

item.title: 欧洲央行会议前科技股继续下跌，欧股出现波动
item.description: 由于科技股加剧了周三的跌势，同时投资者在等待欧洲央行的利率决定，欧洲股市出现波动。【原文：European stocks fluctuated as technology shares added to Wednesday’s drop and as investors await an interest-rate decision from the European Central Bank.】
